content: loop method divide sts p - purl up evenly on both side of needles join in bor - beginning of round the round and place marker for bor co - cast on bobble - bind off round 1 - *k2 tbl p1* repeat to end tbl - through the back loop repeat round 1 for a total of 14 rnds or sts - stitches until your cuff measures 3 5 cm sm - slip marker knit 2 rnds pm - place marker m1l- make one left leaning stitch cable pattern refer to notes on page 3 for details on how to knit the m1l stitch in round 1 - k 8 9 10 p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 this pattern k4 p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 knit to bor m1r- make one right leaning stitch round 2 - k 8 9 10 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 refer to notes on page 2 for details p2 knit to bor on how to knit the m1r stitch in round 3 - k 8 9 10 p2 1/1 lc 1/1 rc p2 this pattern k4 p2 1/1 lc 1/1 rc p2 knit to bor ssk -slip slip knit round 4 - repeat round 2 k2tog - knit two stitches together 1/1 lc - left leaning cable refer to repeat rounds 1-4 five times total notes on page 3 for details on how ending with a round 3 to knit the left leaning cables in this pattern thumb increase setup round 1/1 rc - right leaning cable refer to notes on page 3 for details on how k3 pm k3 4 5 pm k2 p2 k4 to knit the right leaning cables in p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 knit to bor this pattern © maven crafted designs page 4 thumb increase round 3 - k 8 9 10 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 round 1 - k3 sm m1l k 3 4 5 m1r sm p2 knit to bor k2 p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 k4 p2 1/1 rc 1/1 round 4 - k 8 9 10 p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 k4 lc p2 knit to bor p2 1/1 rc 1/1 lc p2 knit to bor round 2 - k3 sm knit to next marker sm k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 knit to bor repeat rounds 1-4 two more times then round 3 - k3 sm knit to next marker sm repeat round 1 once more k2 p2 1/1 lc 1/1 rc p2 k4 p2 1/1 lc 1/1 you should have a total of 15 cable repeats rc p2 knit to bor in total throughout the glove round 4 - k3 sm knit to next marker sm k2 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 k4 p2 knit to bor ribbing repeat rounds 1-4 of the thumb increase knit 1 round section 6 times total ending with a round 4 you should now have 15 16 17 thumb *k2 tbl p1* repeat from * until
